# ControlClose
**SUBCATEGORY:** Controls

<hr />

## Close
### Description
For dismissing a persistent element, such as an alert, or reverting a temporary change in the state of the interface.

<Playground>
  <ControlClose />
</Playground>

**Disabled**
<Playground>
  <ControlClose disabled />
</Playground>

<hr />
